atmosphere: Claustrophobic and threatening despite the luxury; corruption in whispers

cast.active_objective: Varo successfully bribes Marcus, but Marcus's conscience is visibly troubled

director_instructions.pacing: Claustrophobic and threatening despite the luxury; corruption in whispers

narrative_directives.action: At a private bath house, Varo meets with Marcus. In the steam and shadows, coins change hands. Varo speaks softly of loyalty, of rewards, of what happens to those who betray him. Marcus, sweating from more than the heat, accepts the bribe and commits to silence.
narrative_directives.beat_resolution: Varo successfully bribes Marcus, but Marcus's conscience is visibly troubled

constraints.hook_requirement: End with a button line that creates anticipation
